publications.title: Selective directional liquid transport on shoot surfaces of Crassula muscosa
publications.summary: Unveiled an unexpected selective directional liquid transport on shoot surfaces of Crassula muscosa, different from hitherto reported liquid transports on other nature species. Achieved smart and reconfigurable liquid transport on engineered biomimetic counterparts by employing mechanical or magnetic stimuli. (IF: 44.7; Visualized by ScienceAdviser; Highlighted by Science, EurekAlert!, Phys.org, ScienceDaily, Washington City Paper, Weekender Singapore, Hong Kong Commercial Daily, etc)

projects.name: Droplet manipulation
projects.description: Remote, precise, robust, and loss-free control of diverse droplets on a superomniphobic surface. Distinguished from traditional electrowetting on dielectric (EWOD) by a different working mechanism and a simpler and cheaper platform without complex electrode patterns.

projects.name: Selective directional liquid transport on biological surface
projects.description: Unveiled an unexpected selective directional liquid transport on shoot surfaces of Crassula muscosa, different from hitherto reported liquid transports on other nature species. Achieved smart and reconfigurable liquid transport on engineered biomimetic counterparts by employing mechanical or magnetic stimuli.

projects.name: Infrared 3D printer development
projects.description: Designed a microscopic and thermal field observation platform to explore the sintering and melting processes of polymer powders under infrared heat.

projects.name: Micro-compressor inflation process
projects.description: Calculated the thermodynamic and kinetic parameters using Runge-Kutta methods in MATLAB, based on an improved transient heat and mass transfer model. Developed a speed-current double closed-loop PI control for the motor-compressor system using Simulink.

projects.name: High-pressure compressor performance test
